name: MatchBulkCopy
query: select * from (select m.cod_match,floor(rownum / :bsize) fid from matches m order by m.cod_match) where fid = :bindex

name: MatchBulkCopy
query: select * from (select m.cod_match,FLOOR(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY m.cod_match ASC) / @bsize) fid from matches m) m where m.fid = @bindex

name: MatchBulkCopy
query: select * from (select m.cod_match,FLOOR(ROW_NUMBER() OVER w / @bsize) fid from matches m window w as (ORDER BY m.cod_match)) m where m.fid = @bindex
